ascend_skill.desc:
When Motoha deals Electric damage, 15% chance to inflict Shock on the target.
Also, when dealing damage to Shocked foes, increase Attack by 30%.
ascend_skill.name: Strike Zone

ascend_skill.desc: Wrathful Thunder deals 1 more hit. Decrease damage to 15% for hits on the same foe.
ascend_skill.name: Shocking Double Play

ascend_skill.desc: Decrease damage taken from Shocked foes by 20%.
ascend_skill.name: Innings Change

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Wrathful Thunder and Blitz Mine by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Cheerful and Considerate

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase all foes' Electric damage taken by 20% for 2 turns.
ascend_skill.name: Extra Run

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Electroshark and Thief Tactics by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Past Dreams

ascend_skill.desc: Increase Shocked foes' Electric damage taken by 20%, and increase Electric critical damage taken by 20%.
ascend_skill.name: Key to Victory

highlight_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to all foes equal to 162.4%/179.0%/169.1%/185.7% of Attack. For 2 turns, inflict Shock on the main target, and increase Electric damage taken by 10%.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Electric damage to foes equal to 76.7%/84.6%/79.9%/87.7% of Attack (4 hits). From the second hit, prioritize new targets and decrease damage to 10% for hits on the same target.
Attack on main target is guaranteed. Inflict Shock on the main target for 2 turns.
normal_skill.name: Wrathful Thunder

normal_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 157.1%/173.2%/163.6%/179.7% of Attack. Increase party's Electric damage by 11.7%/11.7%/12.2%/12.2% for 2 turns.
normal_skill.name: Blitz Mine

normal_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to all foes equal to 79.3%/87.4%/82.5%/90.6% of Attack. If a foe is Shocked, activate a Technical and deal bonus Electric damage equal to 42.7%/47.1%/44.5%/48.9% of Attack.
normal_skill.name: Electroshark

passive_skill.desc: When inflicting Shock on foes, 66.0% chance to extend effect duration by 1 turn.
passive_skill.name: Extra Inning

passive_skill.desc: Increase Electric damage taken by main target of a skill from Motoha by 20.0% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.
passive_skill.name: Line Drive to Pitcher
